Package com.intellij.openapi.editor.ex.util

Interface DataStorage

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IntBasedStorage, ShortBasedStorage, TextMateLexerDataStorage

    public interface DataStorage
    A storage for storing data in SegmentArrayWithData. Encapsulates segment data logic processing.
